titleStmt.title: A letter written by the governour of Algiers, to the States-General of the United Provinces of the Low-Counteys [sic], &c. in relation to the signing the peace concluded between them
titleStmt.author: Algeria. Dey (1671-1682 : Mehmet)
Mehmet, Dey of Algeria, fl. 1671-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Burrel, at the sign of the Golden-ball under St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: The governour of Algiers = Mehmet, Dey of Algeria.
Variant has: "Low-Countreys, &c." in line ten of title.
Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmiths' Library, University of London.

place.placeName: the sign of the Golden-ball under St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street
